raw_response:
Tbikhat Tmatem, when served, appears as a **rich, vibrant red stew** with a visually concentrated tomato-based sauce. The consistency is **thick and saucy, more like a hearty stew than a soup**, allowing it to cling to the ingredients rather than being watery or brothy. It features **chunks of potatoes and peppers**, which are typically soft but maintain their shape, mingling in the sauce.
